1.content:
So, here is the story: Basically, Eve gets struck with lightning and gains the powers of reality A.K.A the powers of a god.




What choice will she make?
1.title: The Adventure Begins!

11.content:
Just a day before Eve's 18th birthday, her dad walked up to Eve. He said, "Your mom recorded this before you were born and wanted you to see it today. Man, it was so hard to find it out there in the back of the garage!!"

Eve grabs it, saying, "My mom... has a message for me?" She turns to her best friend. "Hey Milly, I wonder what is on this thing?"

"Yeah, let's see it!!"

They put the DVD in the player and watch it. On the screen is a figure that resembled the photos of your mom, but she looked weird. "Dad, that doesn't..."

"Yeah... Something's off. I know she told me to leave the room for some reason, but for her to play 'dress-up?'"

On the screen, the woman says, "If you are seeing this, then tomorrow, at the moment you turn 18, you will become _______ and gain great powers..."
11.title: Eve's awakening...

111.content:
OK, before we continue this story any further, I want to give you readers out there some options.

Note, that the nekomimi species isn't limited to just cat girls, you know.

Anyway, which species of Divine Nekomimi does our heroine Eve become?
111.title: Choosing A Nekomimi

1113.content: Alright, then how about these variations?
1113.title: More Nekomimi Choices

114.content:
On the screen, the woman said, "If you are seeing this, then tomorrow, at the moment you turn 18, you will become a Mystic Witch and gain great powers."

"A Mystic Witch?" curious, eve asked. "What is that?"

As if sensing your question from the grave, the voice stated, "A Mystic Witch is the highest level of witch anyone can achieve and her powers have no equal other than those of divine power. This is my gift you, my daughter, use your new found powers well and wisely." after a pause, she added, "There are strict rules to these powers, you will find them in the black book I had told you never to touch. That book is now yours."

With that, the video ended and eve saw a fine smoke spewing from the DVD player. With a gasp, she hit eject and saw that the DVD had become nothing but smoke that blew out of the player and was gone as if it never existed.

What is Eve to do now?
114.title: Mystic Witch.

choices: Goes to sleep (read in the morning maybe?)
1142.content:
Eve chooses to read the book
And starts to get some of the spells stuck in her head
But then she gets to the warning part of the book
Does she
1142.title: Read the book.

11421.content:
Eve goes to bed
She wakes up the next day
The first thing that comes to her mind is that its her birthday
She then sees the book on the ground
She then remembers the DVD
Am am I I a witch
what does she do next
11421.title: Goes to sleep (read in the morning maybe?)

choices: Eve does something to a passerby.
12.content:
Some time after he unfortunate accident, Eve met up with Milly, who seemed a little concerned when she saw the singed clothes her friend was wearing. "What's with the burnt clothing?" Milly asked Eve, as she idly tugged at her cardigan.

"Oh...I got struck by lightning!" was Eve's calm response.

"WHAT?" a shocked Milly blurted out.

"Its okay, I'm fine, and...I got something to show you!" Eve grinned.
12.title: Something else

choices: She suddenly grows a long, tapered tail with a needle barb on the end?
When the full moon hits her, she transforms into a powerful bimbo?
122.content: What sort of thing happens to Eve?
122.title: Eve transforms in some way.

124.content: Does she turn into a slime or ghost and possess them?
124.title: Eve does something to a passerby.

13.content: Eve's body may have developed, but is still naïve ion many ways. Today she's dancing on sunshine. Mark Peters has asked her out on a date tonight. Usually she would have just said no, but this time Milly was there and pushed her into it. She pretended to be mad at Milly, but in truth she really likes Mark. She steps out in her back yard and looks up at the sky. "Hmm, the sun looks weird today", she says. Then she notices that there are two suns. One of them seems to be getting closer. "What the hell", she begins to say before being slapped in the head by the glowing orb she mistook for another sun. It knocks her right to the ground. The world is a spinning mass of colors for a short time and then blackness. She wakes up a short time later on her back staring up at the sky. She manages to get up and stumbles towards the house. "What was that", she mumbles? She has heard that sometimes brain tumors can cause visually hallucinations. "Oh my god, it's a tumor", she thinks to herself. As soon as she says it she hears a voice that says, "It's not a tumor. You've been chosen to be Earth's new guardian god. Use your powers wisely". "What, what do you mean guardian god", she screams out loud, but receives no answer? She shakes her head. "What the fuck ever. Now I'm going crazy. Dad will probably stick me in therapy again", she mumbles and heads up to her room.
13.title: Add here

choices: Eve transforms to guys who were bugging Milly
Eve changes people randomly at lunch
14.content:
Walking down the hallway at school. Eve was walking sexily towards the cafeteria and to have her lunch. Walking up behind her was Milly.

"Hey you," said Milly, walking up to Eve's left side.

"Hey Milly,' said Eve. 'How's it going?"

"Not bad,' responded Milly. 'But getting a lot of guys asking about you today. I figure they are trying to get dates with you or something. It was super annoying."


"I imagine,' said Eve, rolling her eyes with a devious smile. 'You know I could do something about that..."
14.title: Add here

152.content: How about she grows into a adult? Or a Were-creature? Or a hybrid?
152.title: other

choices: A different creature of the night/More
1522.title: Were-Creature

15221.content: Does Eve feel pain when she transforms?
15221.title: Werewolf

152212.content: Does she think like a human in wolf form?
152212.title: No

choices: The door bell rings surprise Milly ( ability to speak )
1522121.content:
It was Friday night and Eve was at home alone. After reading about werewolves, Eve was wondering how it would feel to be a werewolf, after all, having the powers of a goddess it was a simple task to transform into one. Deciding to call Milly before she transformed, she walked over to the phone and dialled Milly's number, inviting him to her home.

Placing down the phone, she willed her power into the transformation, it took less than a minute before Eve was basically looking through the eyes of a wolf. The form of Eve the human was gone, a snowy white wolf has taken it's place.
1522121.title: Yes

15223.title: A different creature of the night/More

152231.content: What about a jiang shi("hopping zombie")
152231.title: Yes

1522311.content: "Hmmm...I want to be unique, but what can I turn myself into that has not been done before?" Eve said out loud. She remembered about reading a article about a different kind of zombie that was unique. 'What was it called again? Oh yeah! A Jiang Shi!', Eve thought to her self. After thinking about turning into one, she noticed that her hands, although flexible, stiffened a little bit before turning into claw-like hands. 'Am-Am I-?', before she could finish her thought, Eve noticed a slip of paper that was on her face. Eve quickly ripped it out before drawing the word, "Myself" in Chinese. "Wait, how could I- Did the transformation do this?", She wondered to herself. Eve cringed in slight discomfort as her clothes changed from her normal attire to that of something a(Much to her amazement,) modern-looking Jiang Shi would wear. "I gotta say, I'm a little jealous!", Eve said out loud after her transformation ended as she got a good look at herself in the mirror. She looked like a normal person except with many differences: Her hands alone made her look like a monster. Her once human hands turned into clawed hands that would make Freddy Krueger jealous.(They looked a little metallic, but she could sheath them similar to a cat's, making her hands look human again.) Her body looked a little pale. Eve saw that she was wearing a hoodie that had the kanji "Demon" on her back, pants that made her legs(Which she noticed, had grown a little about 3 inches or so.) look like she was a ghost. Eve saw that her her now yellow eyes looked a little scary, but not by much. 'I wonder what Milly(her best friend) will think of me? Well, only one way to find out!', Eve thought to herself before walking to the phone....or rather, hopping to it. "What am I-?! Oh yeah.", she said to herself as she remembered that Jiang Shi's love to hop. After altering some of her instincts, she ran to the phone and dialed his number. "Yeah?", Milly answered, a kind tone in her voice. "Hey ! I was wondering if you wanted to hang out with me. I've got something to show you.", asked Eve. "Sure! How about 8:00PM?"(It's about 7:45) "Fine by me! See ya soon!", Eve responded with happiness before hanging up the phone. "Is she going to be in for a shock when she gets here!", Eve chuckled to herself.
1522311.title: A new Jiang Shi is in town.

info.brief_description: Eve is bored one day and gains the ability to transform anything around her.
info.description:
Name: Eve Willows

Bio: Her mother died after giving birth to her. Her father raised Eve to be gentle to mostly everyone. However, she had a very traumatic life thanks to her babysitter screwing up both her body and her mind.
Her dad did give her some therapy, so she is not as bonkers as she was back then. Growing up was hard on her. People bullied her on a daily basis. As such, she was very lonely at ages 5- 11. At age 12 however, Eve made a friend by the name Milly Erson. They became close friends. She has shown but rarely an ability to copy attacks and did not use it for a long time. Eve's body in her early years was considered "childish" by many. At age 18 however, puberty hit her with a sledgehammer. Example: she got MANY boys asking her if she had a boyfriend. Everyone was shocked to know that was the girl they bullied in the past. Eve has been seen using her new power willingly. She is still friends
with Milly to this day.

She is very mischievous to most people and her new ability basically makes her God. Add, Read, and Review!!!
